name: Gopnik
description:
Do you want to feel like a native of Russia in the mid-90s? Then this game is for you. You will have the opportunity to visit the town of Novobichevs and fight with local gopniks. Your task is simple, it is to establish influence over all profitable points in the city. To do this, you will have a whole arsenal of 6 types of weapons. Gopnik gangs are scattered around the city and guard points, find all the gangs and kill them. For each destroyed gang, you will receive a reward, with which you can improve your character, namely, buy him new clothes. Passing the game you can admire the beautiful Russian world.
Destroy gangs, get respect, show who the real gopnik is.

  • 1 beautiful map
  • 6 types of weapons
  • Advanced AI
